p: Boukhatem et al., [ 10], studied the antibacterial activity of the lemongrass essential oil from Cymbopogon citratus and reported its potent activity against Gram + organisms compared to Gram - organisms. Our present results with lemongrass oil isolated from Cymbopogon flexousus show that this particular essential oil is equally effective against both Gram + and Gram - bacteria and shows no preferential activity towards a particular Gram reaction ( Table 2).
